author: trawick
msg: By default, use the same CC and CPP with which APR was built.
The user can override with CC and CPP environment variables.

author: trawick
msg: account for a couple of fixes moved back to 2.0.46-dev

author: trawick
msg: Fix ap_construct_url() so that it surrounds IPv6 literal address
strings with [].  This fixes certain types of redirection.
Reviewed by:  Bill Stoddard, Thom May
